Question & Options:

Options:
A. National Film Awards
B. Filmfare Awards
C. Academy Awards
D. Screen Awards

Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Black' (2005) receive at the Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. Best Film
B. Best Director
C. Best Actress
D. Best Story

Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Black' (2005) receive at the Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. Best Director awarded to Sanjay Leela Bhansali
B. Best Film
C. Best Actress for Rani Mukerji
D. Best Music Director
Correct Answer: Best Director awarded to Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Best Actress for Rani Mukerji

Question & Options:
Which accolades did the movie 'Black' (2005) receive at the Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. Best Actor awarded to Amitabh Bachchan
B. Best Director
C. Best Film
D. Best Actress awarded to Rani Mukerji
Correct Answer: Best Actor awarded to Amitabh Bachchan
